attributes.action: Ban the art of Guillermo Vargas Habacuc from being sold or displayed in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The art of Guillermo Vargas Habacuc if you can call it art has been causing disgust and disbeleif due to the extreme and graphic nature of the work. One piece of "art" is a dog brought in off the street and tied to a cable then left to starve!
